con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="CPPSoapGateway" targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CPPSoapGateway" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:tns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CPPSoapGateway" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:atcm-cfareq="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" xmlns:atcm-cfares="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsResponse" xmlns:cpp-sreq="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchRequestType" xmlns:cpp-sres="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchResponseType"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" schemaLocation="CreateFineAccounts/CreateFineAccountsRequest.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsResponse" schemaLocation="CreateFineAccounts/CreateFineAccountsResponse.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchRequestType" schemaLocation="DebtorProfileSearch/SearchRequestType.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchResponseType" schemaLocation="DebtorProfileSearch/SearchResponseType.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="iCreateFineAccountsRequest"> <wsdl:part name="iCreateFineAccountsRequest" element="atcm-cfareq:CreateFineAccountsRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="iCreateFineAccountsResponse"> <wsdl:part name="iCreateFineAccountsResponse" element="atcm-cfares:CreateFineAccountsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="iSearchRequestType"> <wsdl:part name="iSearchRequestType" element="cpp-sreq:SearchRequestType"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="iSearchResponseType"> <wsdl:part name="iSearchResponseType" element="cpp-sres:SearchResponseType"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="iCppGatewayType"> <wsdl:operation name="createFineAccounts"> <wsdl:input message="tns:iCreateFineAccountsRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:iCreateFineAccountsResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchType"> <wsdl:input message="tns:iSearchRequestType"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:iSearchResponseType"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CppGatewayBinding" type="tns:iCppGatewayType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="createFineAccounts"> <soap:operation soapAction="createFineAccounts"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="searchType"> <soap:operation soapAction="searchType"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CppGatewayService"> <wsdl:port name="CppGatewayPort" binding="tns:CppGatewayBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates"/> <wswa:UsingAddressing xmlns:wswa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing/wsdl"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest file:///C:/development/atcmsvn/trunk/app/common-code/wsdl-xsd/src/main/resources/xsd/atcm/CreateFineAccounts/CreateFineAccountsRequest.xsd">--> <!--<xsd:schema xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" xmlns:tns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:lg="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/FineAccount" targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning" vc:minVersion="1.1" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" >--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" vc:minVersion="1.1" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsRequest" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:lg="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/FineAccount" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">CGI IT UK Limited. A CGI Group Inc. Company Registered Office: 250 Brook Drive, Green Park, Reading RG2 6UA, United Kingdom.
Registered in England and Wales - Number 947968
0.1 - DD - 22/08/2016 - Initial draft 0.2 - DB - 13/09/2016 - Updated to reflect PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.7DP 0.3 - DB - 21/09/2016 - Added ATCM UUID field Updated Defendant Title to enum Changed Company Name and Forname/Surname to a choice Changed all address fields to 3 seperate fields Changed Aliases to split Fornames and Surnames Moved Date of Sentence and Imposing Court to Defendant from Impositions Updated Document Language and Hearing Language to enums Added new Imposition types to enum Added Minor Creditors section Added Default Days in Jail field Added Account Notes 6 and updated Account Notes to max length 28 Changed NumberOfFines to NumberOfCases and corrected type 0.4 - DB - 19/10/2016 - Split Fine Account elements into a seperate schema Reflects PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.7DP 0.6 - DB - 10/11/2016 - Reflects PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.12</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/FineAccount" schemaLocation="FineAccount.xsd"/> <!--======================--> <!--CASE DEFINITIONS--> <!--======================--> <xsd:element name="CreateFineAccountsRequest"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Schema defining the elements in Fines accumulated over a day</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="lg:FineAccount" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="NumberOfFineAccounts" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/FineAccount" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" vc:minVersion="1.1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/FineAccount" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">CGI IT UK Limited. A CGI Group Inc. Company Registered Office: 250 Brook Drive, Green Park, Reading RG2 6UA, United Kingdom.
Registered in England and Wales - Number 947968
0.4 - DB - 19/10/2016 - Split Fine account elements into this seperate schema. Added Alias Initials Reflects PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.11DP 0.5 - DB - 20/10/2016 - Updated all standard string fields so they are restricted to Single Byte ASCII characters Added Defendant Initials Removed FFR Imposition Code from enumeration 0.6 - DB - 10/11/2016 - Reflects PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.12 Changed CPPCaseID to CPPID Changed structure of Account Notes Changed structure of Defendant Aliases Changed length of CPPUUID Updated Telephone Regular Expression Updated Imposition Result Code with new enum Added sequence number attibutes for minor creditors and account notes 0.7 - DB - 24/11/2016 - Removed Offence Serial Number from Imposition Added sequenceNumber attribute to Imposition Changed Bank Sort Code to Positive Integer exactly 6 characters long Changed Bank Account Number to Positive Integer 0.7a- DB - 20/01/2017 - Change maximum length of Employer Telephone Number to 20 characters Changed Parent Guardian To Pay field to be optional 0.8 - DW - 29/10/2019 - Introduce PaymentCardRequest element into PaymentTermsType 0.9 - DW - 12/11/2019 - Correct typo in Installment to Instalment 1.0 - DW - 01/09/2020 - Introduce ProsecutorCaseReference into FineAccount 1.1 - DW - 04/09/2020 - Introduce additional enumeration for LastEnforcementAction 1.2 - DW - 25/09/2020 - Changes to enumeration for LastEnforcementAction 1.3 - DW - 14/10/2020 - Change ProsecutorCaseReference to minOccurs 0 1.4 - DW - 16/06/2021 - update ProsecutorCaseReference to maxLength 30</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType name="ASCIIString"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A single byte ASCII string that cannot be empty</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[ -]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="FineAccount"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CPPID"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CPPUUID"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="36"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccDivisionCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProsecutorCaseReference" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Defendant" type="DefendantEntityType"/> <xsd:element name="Imposition" type="LibraImpositionType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="ParentGuardian" type="ParentGuardianType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="PaymentTerms" type="LibraPaymentTermsType"/> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditor" type="MinorCreditorType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="AccountNote" type="LibraAccountNotesType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="Employer" type="EmployerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <!--==============================--> <!--PERSON ENTITY INFORMATION--> <!--==============================--> <xsd:complexType name="DefendantEntityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defendant Entity Type - Elements that make up a person or company's details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Title"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Mr"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Mrs"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Ms"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Miss"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Co"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Surname"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Forenames"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Initials"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DOB" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>YYYY-MM-DD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CompanyName" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="Age" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="80"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^*]{1,30}\*[^*]{0,30}\*[^*]{0,16}\*\*"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Postcode" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Alias" type="AliasType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="5"/> <xsd:element name="NationalInsuranceNumber" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="9"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TelephoneNumberHome" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> <xsd:pattern value="[\d -]*"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TelephoneNumberBusiness" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> <xsd:pattern value="[\d -]*"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TelephoneNumberMobile" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> <xsd:pattern value="[\d -]*"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress1" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="76"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress2" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="76"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="VehicleMake" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="VehicleRegistrationMark" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="11"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DocumentLanguage" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value=""/> <xsd:enumeration value="W"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HearingLanguage" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value=""/> <xsd:enumeration value="W"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DateOfSentence"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>YYYY-MM-DD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ImposingCourt" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>From local justice area data - use code only</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EnforcingCourt"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CollectionOrderMade"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="LastEnforcementAction" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ABDC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AEO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AEOC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CLAMPO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COLLO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="HTT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INTL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MPSO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NAP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOENF"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PRIS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REM"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPWO"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccountComment" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--=============================--> <!--ALIAS INFORMATION--> <!--=============================--> <xsd:complexType name="AliasType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AliasForenames" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AliasInitials" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AliasSurname" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--=============================--> <!--IMPOSITIONS INFORMATION--> <!--=============================--> <xsd:complexType name="LibraImpositionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Libra Impositions Type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="OffenceCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CJS Offence Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ImpositionResultCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="FO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FCPC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FVS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FVEBD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FCOST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FCOMP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FCC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ImpositionAmount"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total Sum to be Paid in Pounds and Pence example 154.50</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice minOccurs="0"> <xsd:element name="MajorCreditorCode"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Major Creditor reference type abbreviation code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorSequenceNumber"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This should match the Sequence Number attribute of the relevant Minor Creditor element</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="sequenceNumber" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Controls the order of the Minor Creditors numbers. Starts at 1</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <!--================================--> <!--MINOR CREDITOR--> <!--================================--> <xsd:complexType name="MinorCreditorType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorTitle"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Mr"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Mrs"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Ms"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Miss"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Co"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorSurname"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorInitials"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorForenames"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CompanyName"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="50"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorAddress" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="80"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^*]{1,30}\*[^*]{0,30}\*[^*]{0,16}\*\*"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorPostcode" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MinorCreditorPayByBACS"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BankAccountType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:totalDigits value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BankSortCode" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:totalDigits value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BankAccountNumber" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"> <xsd:totalDigits value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccountName" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BankAccountReference" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="18"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="sequenceNumber" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Controls the order of the Minor Creditors numbers. Starts at 1</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <!--================================--> <!--PAYMENT TERMS INFORMATION--> <!--================================--> <xsd:complexType name="LibraPaymentTermsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Libra Payment Terms Type</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PaymentTermsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>From Reference data - use code only</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="BD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ML"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PD"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PayByDate" type="PayByDateType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="LumpSumAmount" type="LumpSumAmountType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Instalments" type="InstalmentType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="DefaultDaysInJail" type="xsd:nonNegativeInteger"/> <xsd:element name="ParentGuardianToPay" type="ParentGuardianToPayType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="PayByDateType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Pay by Date example is YYYY-MM-DD I.e. 2015-07-18</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="LumpSumAmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Total Sum to be Paid in Pounds and Pence example 154.50</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ParentGuardianToPayType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Parent/Guardian will pay when set to Y is Yes</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value=""/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--=================================--> <!--INSTALMENTS DATA--> <!--=================================--> <xsd:complexType name="InstalmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Instalments and Payment Cards</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="InstalmentAmount" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreed Instalment to be paid in pounds and pence example 12.50</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:minInclusive value="0"/> <xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="InstalmentStartDate" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Agreed Instalment to be paid in pounds and pence example 12.50</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PaymentCardRequest" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Where a payment card is requested for issue</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--=================================--> <!--PARENT GUARDIAN INFORMATION--> <!--=================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ParentGuardianType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Libra ParentGuardianType</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="30"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="76"/> <xsd:pattern value="[^*]{1,25}\*[^*]{0,25}\*[^*]{0,22}\*\*"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--===================--> <!--ACCOUNT NOTES--> <!--===================--> <xsd:complexType name="LibraAccountNotesType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>AccountNotesType</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="AccountNoteText"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Note Line</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="28"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:all> <xsd:attribute name="sequenceNumber" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Controls the order of the account numbers. Starts at 1</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:positiveInteger"> <xsd:totalDigits value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <!--===================--> <!--EMPLOYER--> <!--===================--> <xsd:complexType name="EmployerType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EmployerType</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="EmployerReference"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerCompanyName"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerAddressLine1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerAddressLine2" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerAddressLine3" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerAddressLine4" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerAddressLine5" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="32"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerPostCode" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerTelephoneNumber" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> <xsd:pattern value="[\d -]*"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EmployerEmailAddress" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="ASCIIString"> <xsd:maxLength value="76"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsResponse" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" vc:minVersion="1.1" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsResponse" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreateFineAccountsResponse" xmlns:lg="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreatedFineAccount" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">CGI IT UK Limited. A CGI Group Inc. Company Registered Office: 250 Brook Drive, Green Park, Reading RG2 6UA, United Kingdom.
Registered in England and Wales - Number 947968
0.1 - DD - 22/08/2016 - Initial draft 0.2 - DB - 13/09/2016 - Updated to reflect PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.7DP 0.3 - DB - 21/09/2016 - Added ATCM UUID to reflect PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.11DP 0.4 - DB - 19/10/2016 - Added Error message element 0.6 - DB - 10/11/2016 - Reflects PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.12</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreatedFineAccount" schemaLocation="CreatedFineAccount.xsd"/> <!--======================--> <!--SIMPLE TYPES--> <!--======================--> <!--No Global Simple Types defines--> <!--======================--> <!--CASE REQUEST--> <!--======================--> <xsd:element name="CreateFineAccountsResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="lg:CreatedFineAccount" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="NumberOfFineAccounts" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Contains code for any error messages that are caused by a problem with the request file. Any problems with individual account requests are returned in the relevant CreatedFineAccount element</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="5"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ErrorMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Contains any error messages that are caused by a problem with the request file. Any problems with individual account requests are returned in the relevant CreatedFineAccount element</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreatedFineAccount" elementFormDefault="unqualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" vc:minVersion="1.1" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/CreatedFineAccount" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">CGI IT UK Limited. A CGI Group Inc. Company Registered Office: 250 Brook Drive, Green Park, Reading RG2 6UA, United Kingdom.
Registered in England and Wales - Number 947968
0.4 - DB - 19/10/2016 - Split CreatedFineAccount into seperate schema file Updated name of Case ID and UUID to CPP Case ID and CPP UUID Updated Case ID to 15 characters long 0.6 - DB - 10/11/2016 - Reflects PD.4687 Data Requirements for ATCM to Libra GOB Interface v0.12 Removed Account Division code Renamed CPPCaseID to CPPID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="CreatedFineAccount"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fine Response - parameters required to provide Fine information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CPPID"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CPPUUID"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="36"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AccountNumber"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="9"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="5"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ErrorMessage"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4000"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchRequestType" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" vc:minVersion="1.1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchRequestType" xmlns:lgsm="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchMetadataType" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">CGI IT UK Limited. A CGI Group Inc. Company Registered Office: 14th Floor, 20 Fenchurch Street, London EC3M 3BY, United Kingdom.
Registered in England and Wales - Number 947968
0.1 - TR - 27/03/2020 - Initial Draft 0.2 - DW - 03/04/2020 - Update Surname to minLength 1 update Forename1 to minLength 1 0.3 - TR - 08/04/2020 - move SearchMetaDataType into a common schema OrganisationName min length changed from 2 to 1 0.4 - DW - 09/04/2020 - update Forename1 to Forenames and minOccurs 1 remove Forename2 1.0 - DW - 20/04/2020 - Issued as Final 1.1 - DW - 01/09/2020 - change maxOccurs for Defendant to 1</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchMetadataType" schemaLocation="SearchMetadataType.xsd"/> <!--=============================--> <!--SEARCH REQUEST--> <!--=============================--> <xsd:element name="SearchRequestType"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="lgsm:SearchMetadataType"/> <xsd:element name="Defendant" type="DefendantType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <!--==============================--> <!--DEFENDANT--> <!--==============================--> <xsd:complexType name="DefendantType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defendant details for search request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PartyType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If the defenandt is a person or organistaion</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="P"/> <xsd:enumeration value="O"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="Person" type="PersonType"/> <xsd:element name="OrganisationName" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--==============================--> <!--PERSON--> <!--==============================--> <xsd:complexType name="PersonType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Person details for search request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Surname" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Forenames" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DateOfBirth" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>YYYY-MM-DD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NationalInsuranceNumber" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchMetadataType" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" vc:minVersion="1.1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchMetadataType" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">CGI IT UK Limited. A CGI Group Inc. Company Registered Office: 14th Floor, 20 Fenchurch Street, London EC3M 3BY, United Kingdom.
Registered in England and Wales - Number 947968
0.1 - TR - 08/04/2020 - Initial Draft</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="SearchMetadataType"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Metadata relating to a defendant search request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SequenceNumber" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"></xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CPPDefendantID" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"></xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CPPCaseID" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"></xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CourtOUCode" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:length value="7"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DateOfHearing" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>YYYY-MM-DD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TimeOfHearing" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>HH:MM</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:time"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchResponseType" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" vc:minVersion="1.1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchResponseType" xmlns:lgsm="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchMetadataType" xmlns:vc="http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">CGI IT UK Limited. A CGI Group Inc. Company Registered Office: 14th Floor, 20 Fenchurch Street, London EC3M 3BY, United Kingdom.
Registered in England and Wales - Number 947968
0.1 - TR - 27/03/2020 - Initial Draft 0.2 - DW - 03/04/2020 - removed duplicate AccountNumber element 0.3 - TR - 08/04/2020 - moved to common SearchMetadataType 0.4 - DW - 09/04/2020 - update Forename1 to Forenames update DebtorName to OrganisationName remove Forename2 and Forename3 0.5 - DW - 20/04/2020 - Introduce NationalInsuranceNumber to AccountType 1.0 - DW - 20/04/2020 - Issued as Final 1.1 - DW - 24/04/2020 - Introduce ProsecutorCaseReference into AccountType 1.2 - CP - 06/08/2020 - Adding data type to element OrganisationName , Forenames , Surname , AccountNumber ,AddressLine (1,2,3) , Postcode , BalanceOutstanding , LastEnforcementAction , OriginatingCT , DaysInDefault ,AmountPaid , AmountImposed, PaymentTerms and ProsecutorCaseReference</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchMetadataType" schemaLocation="SearchMetadataType.xsd"/> <!--=============================--> <!--SEARCH RESPONSE--> <!--=============================--> <xsd:element name="SearchResponseType"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="lgsm:SearchMetadataType"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="AccountMatch" type="AccountMatchType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="5"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ErrorMessage"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4000"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <!--==============================--> <!--ACCOUNT MATCHES--> <!--==============================--> <xsd:complexType name="AccountMatchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Accounts matching the defendant search request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Matches"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="NoMatches" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Account" type="AccountType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--==============================--> <!--ACCOUNT--> <!--==============================--> <xsd:complexType name="AccountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Account details for search request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="OrganisationName" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Forenames" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Surname" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="DOB" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>YYYY-MM-DD</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:date"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="NationalInsuranceNumber" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AccountNumber" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="AddressLine1" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="AddressLine2" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="AddressLine3" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Postcode" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="LastEnforcementAction" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="BalanceOutstanding" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="CollectionOrderMade" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Y if the account is subject to a colection order, otherwise N</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PaymentTerms" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="AmountImposed" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="AmountPaid" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="DaysInDefault" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="MasterAccount" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Y if the account has been used as a master for consolidation, otherwise N</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="OriginatingCT" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The GoB MET CT Code where the account is held</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ParentGuardianFlag" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If the account is to be paid by a Parent or Guardian</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Y"/> <xsd:enumeration value="N"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ProsecutorCaseReference" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:sear="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchRequestType" xmlns:sear1="http://www.justice.gov.uk/magistrates/atcm/SearchMetadataType"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <sear:SearchRequestType> <sear1:SearchMetadataType> <sear1:SequenceNumber>?</sear1:SequenceNumber> <sear1:CPPDefendantID>?</sear1:CPPDefendantID> <sear1:CPPCaseID>?</sear1:CPPCaseID> <sear1:CourtOUCode>?</sear1:CourtOUCode> <sear1:DateOfHearing>?</sear1:DateOfHearing> <sear1:TimeOfHearing>?</sear1:TimeOfHearing> </sear1:SearchMetadataType> <sear:Defendant> <sear:PartyType>?</sear:PartyType> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <sear:Person> <sear:Surname>?</sear:Surname> <sear:Forenames>?</sear:Forenames> <!--Optional:--> <sear:DateOfBirth>?</sear:DateOfBirth> <!--Optional:--> <sear:NationalInsuranceNumber>?</sear:NationalInsuranceNumber> </sear:Person> <sear:OrganisationName>?</sear:OrganisationName> </sear:Defendant> </sear:SearchRequestType> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
